page.title: 02HOUSING IN OWERMOIGNE
page.content: THE GREAT VARIETY OF{HOUSING}IN OUR BLOCK RANGES FROM THE{MANOR HOUSE}WITH ORIGINS IN 1263-80 TO MODERN FOUR BEDROOM{EXECUTIVE HOMES},TO{TIED FARM {COTTAGES}AND{COUNCIL HOUSES}.WE STILL HAVE{4 ORIGINAL FARM HOUSES},THOUGH ONLY ONE OF THESE WORKS TODAY.EACH HAD FARM WORKERS COTTAGES WHICH ARE STILL {THATCHED}.SINCE 1926 A{SMALL COUNCIL {ESTATE}HAS BEEN BUILT, 2 SMALL{PRIVATE {ESTATES}AND THERE HAS BEEN SOME {IN-FILLING},BUT THE VILLAGE RETAINS MUCH OF ITS{ORIGINAL CHARACTER.} RECENTLY SOME OF THE COUNCIL HOUSES HAVE BEEN{BOUGHT}BY THEIR OCCUPIERS AND THIS TREND IS CONTINUING.THERE IS ONE ALL YEAR{CARAVAN SITE}IN OUR BLOCK.LITTLE NEW DEVELOPMENT IS POSSIBLE AS RURAL PRESERVATION IS AN IMPORTANT LOCAL ISSUE.
